message.entry: The {0} value must be a numeric, string, char, or a cell array of character vectors.
The number of {0} values must match the number of shapes.
The Label value must be a numeric vector, a string vector, a categorical vector, or a cell array of character vectors.
Invalid use of 'ShowOrientation'. Shape must be "rectangle" and position must be an M-by-5 matrix.
The position value must be an M-by-4 matrix for axis-aligned rectangles or an M-by-5 matrix for rotated rectangles.
The position value must be an M-by-9 matrix for cuboids.
The position value must be an M-by-8 matrix for projected cuboids.
The radius of all circles must be positive.
The position value for polygon or line shapes must be specified as an L-by-2 or 1-by-2L matrix or a cell array of L-by-2 or 1-by-2L matrices.
The major and minor axes lengths for all ellipses must be positive and the minor axis length must be less than or equal to the major axis length.
